description: John is a young adult with autism who enjoys creating vibrant artwork and has recently begun working at Bright Horizons Accounting.
relationship: John keeps in touch with his extended family through the Slack group "The Family Circle." Other people in his life include colleagues at Bright Horizons Accounting (such as his supervisor and teammate), a friend who follows his artwork, and various relatives like Aunt Clara and cousin Lisa who share family news in the Slack channel.
